# fenugreek

one or the most impressive wanderwords of the ancients

𓍲 𓈖 𓏮 𓁸 𓏥 𓇾 𓈇 𓏤 𓆰 𓇠 | fenugreek ?

𒌑𒁀𒇸𒌅 šam-ba-lil-tu šambaliltu şembelîlk@Kurd شنبلیله šambalile@Persia “fenugreek”
𒊭𒁀𒇸𒌅 šabbaliltu שִׁבְּלִילְתָא šibbəlīləṯā ܫܒܠܝܠܬܐ šebbəlīltā
𒊭𒄠𒁀𒇷𒅋𒌈 /šambaliltum/ şembelîkum balsamikum basilikum permutations of spices!
𒊭𒄠𒈬 𒁀𒅋𒌈 /šammu baliltu/ “fenugreek”, literally “mixture grass”
⇔
𒋆𒄬 šem'buluh; ba-lu-hum "an aromatic tree or its resin" Akk. balahhu
𒋉 ŠIM×BULUG 𒁑 BULUG
𒋎 ŠEMBULUGX ŠIM×KUŠU2
𒋍 ŠEMBI ŠIM×IGI-gunû

𒋆 šimᵃˡ smell, aroma 𓌢 𓈖 𓂉 scent sense

𓍲 𓈖 𓏮 𓁸 𓏥 𓇾 𓈇 𓏤 𓆰 𓇠 | fenugreek ?
